  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205395</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Needlework: Don Ed Hardy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Näharbeit: Ziehen Sie Robuste ED An</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Couture : Mettez L'ED Robuste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Needlework: Don O Ed Hardy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cucito: Indossi Il Ed Hardy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραπτική: Φορέστε τους ΕΔ σκληραγωγημένους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Costura: Ponga El Ed Robusto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK trails behind internationally known tattooist Don Ed Hardy as he looks back at a career that has taken him from the tattoo parlor to the gallery and back again. This Educator Guide explores the tradition of tattooing from the earliest civilizations to the present day.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN-Spuren hinter international bekanntem 
tattooist ziehen ED an, er zurück einer Karriere so robust auch 
betrachtet, die ihn vom Tätowierungwohnzimmer zur Galerie und zur 
Rückseite wieder genommen hat. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung 
erforscht die Tradition von Tattooing von den frühesten 
Zivilisationen zum anwesenden Tag.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les traînées d'ÉTINCELLE derrière le tattooist
internationalement connu mettent l'ED tout robuste qu'il regarde en 
arrière une carrière qui l'a porté du salon de tatouage à la 
galerie et au dos encore. Ce guide d'éducateur explore la 
tradition de tattooing des civilisations les plus tôt à aujourd'hui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As fugas da FAÍSCA atrás do tattooist 
internacional sabido don o Ed por mais hardy que olhe para trás em 
uma carreira que fizesse exame dele da sala de estar do tattoo à 
galeria e à parte traseira outra vez. Esta guia do educador 
explora a tradição de tattooing das civilizações as mais 
adiantadas ao dia atual.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le tracce della SCINTILLA dietro il tattooist 
internazionalmente conosciuto indossano il Ed per quanto osservi hardy
indietro una carriera che lo ha preso ancora dal salone del tatuaggio 
alla galleria ed alla parte posteriore. Questa guida 
dell'educatore esplora la tradizione di tattooing dalle civilizzazioni
più iniziali ad oggi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα ίχνη ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΩΝ πίσω από το διεθνώς γνωστό 
tattooist φορούν τους ΕΔ σκληραγωγημένους όπως εξετάζει πίσω 
μια σταδιοδρομία που τον έχει πάρει από την αίθουσα 
δερματοστιξιών στη στοά και την πλάτη πάλι. Αυτός ο οδηγός
εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά την παράδοση της διάστιξης από τους πιό 
πρόωρους πολιτισμούς μέχρι την παρούσα ημέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los rastros de la CHISPA detrás del tattooist 
internacionalmente sabido ponen el Ed tan robusto que él mira detrás
una carrera que lo ha llevado de la sala del tatuaje a la galería y a
la parte posteriora otra vez. Esta guía del educador explora la
tradición de tattooing de las civilizaciones más tempranas a hoy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205395</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
